titleStmt.title: A letter from a gentleman in Ireland to his friend in London upon occasion of a pamphlet entituled a vindication of the present government of Ireland under His Excellency Richard Earl of Tyrconnel.

notesStmt.note: "I shall prove, that it has been, and still is the advantage ... that Ireland should be govern'd by an Englishman" -- p. 2.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
